artifact.title: Slow Build Check-In
artifact.subtitle: Building a foundation for a long-term relationship through self discovery and with your partner

stage.label: Intentional Early Dating
eligibility: You want to move slow and protect trust.
You want light structure (pacing, check-ins, consent) without defining long-term commitments.

purpose: Protect trust around affection and escalation
Improve communication and comfort in social settings

instructions.title: Instructions
items: This is not a test, not a contract, and not a 'define us' talk.
Answer what feels true right now, not what you think 'should' be true.
It is okay to choose multiple options, rank them, or say 'it depends.'
It is okay to skip any question.
Safe-to-pause: if either of you feels flooded or tense, pause immediately and do something grounding, then return later if desired.
Use a time box and stop when it ends. Then do something light and enjoyable.

keep_in_mind.title: Keep in Mind
items: The goal is less mind-reading and more kindness.
Clarity should feel calming, not pressuring.
Going slow can be wisdom, not low interest.
Physical affection should feel safe, chosen, and easy to pause.
Past pressure around intimacy matters. Protect trust by moving with consent and attunement.
Answers can change. Nothing here is permanent.

privacy_preface.title: Optional Privacy Preface (Say Out Loud Before Using AI)
privacy_preface.text: If we use a model to reflect on our answers, we only paste what we both agree is okay to share. We can remove details. We can keep it fully local. We can also skip AI entirely. The goal is insight and kindness, not analysis for its own sake.
